parlays.reasoning: While Detroit is the underdog, this parlay capitalizes on their strong interior presence with Stewart recording 4 blocks in their opener and Cunningham's elite playmaking (10 assists last game). The Pistons' 10 blocks per game and aggressive defensive approach could disrupt Houston's rhythm.
